Package app.connectors

Class ConnectorRegistreClient

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
app.connectors.ConnectorRegistreClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.ConnectorI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.registry.interfaces.LookupCI, Remote
public class ConnectorRegistreClient extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector implements fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.registry.interfaces.LookupCI
A connector class that implements the LookupCI interface to facilitate the lookup operations between client components and sensor network registry components. This connector provides methods to find connection information for sensor nodes either by their identifier or by their geographical location. This class extends AbstractConnector, providing concrete implementations for the lookup methods defined in the LookupCI interface.

  • Method Details

    • findByIdentifier

      public fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.ConnectionInfoI findByIdentifier(String sensorNodeId) throws Exception
      Retrieves the connection information for a sensor node based on its identifier. This method forwards the query to the connected registry component which performs the actual lookup based on the node identifier provided.
      Specified by:
      findByIdentifier in interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.registry.interfaces.LookupCI
      Parameters:
      sensorNodeId - The unique identifier of the sensor node for which connection information is requested.
      Returns:
      The ConnectionInfoI of the sensor node if found, otherwise null.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an issue in retrieving the information.

    • findByZone

      public Set<fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.ConnectionInfoI> findByZone(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.GeographicalZoneI z) throws Exception
      Retrieves a set of connection information for all sensor nodes located within a specified geographical zone. This method forwards the geographical query to the connected registry component which performs the search and returns a set of connection information for nodes within the specified zone.
      Specified by:
      findByZone in interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.registry.interfaces.LookupCI
      Parameters:
      z - The GeographicalZoneI defining the geographical area for the lookup.
      Returns:
      A set of ConnectionInfoI representing the sensor nodes within the specified geographical zone.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an issue in performing the lookup.
